profile:
Young Lads Inc. is a reputable contracting firm serving commercial and residential clients in the Ottawa Valley.

Quotes within a week.
Transparent Pricing
Results Guaranteed
Budget Conscious
Strong attention to detail.
services:
Commercial & Residential:
-Hardwood & Vinyl Flooring
-Steel & Shingle roofs + snow removal
-Drywall & Mud
-Baseboard & Trim
-Roofing
- Painting
